channel.title: Contribute on Aggregator
channel.description: Recent content in Contribute on Aggregator

item.title: Pipelines
item.description: Build and deploy # The ci.yml pipeline is encompassing all steps required to publish all Aggregator components. This build is triggered by any push of commits or tags as long as they touch the /src/ directory or a workflow. Some steps and jobs runs only for a tag starting with v, others when the build is run on the default master branch: you see a label v or m or both aside each conditional phase.
